Source.Value: AWS Kendra is a highly scalable and intelligent search service powered by machine learning. It enables organizations to search and discover information across their data silos effectively. AWS Kendra can be integrated with multiple existing content repositories, including SharePoint, Salesforce, Amazon S3, and internal databases,to consolidate all relevant support documents and knowledge bases.Here is a use case illustrating how AWS Kendra can be utilized to retrieve answers for queries submitted by users from the resources defined in the AWS Kendra Index. In this illustration, AWS Kendra Index is integrated with AWS S3 that contains documentation related to AWS services like Lambda, S3, EC2 and Kendra. Hence, any queries related to these services will be answered in this resource case type.
